HeadComp.title: Voice API for your Business | Voice Call API | MSG91-Philippines
HeadComp.description: MSG91 provides voice call api's to your business which helps to engage your customers over voice with our virtual phone numbers, and voice APIs..

BannerComp.heading: Boost customer engagement and build trust
BannerComp.subheading: Start real-time conversations with crystal clear audio, low latency and deeper insights.

features.name: Call Monitoring
features.content: Introducing the next-level communication experience with our all-new Call Monitoring featuresWe're empowering you to take the reins of your conversations. These powerful functionalities offer you increased control and deeper insights during your calls, ensuring improved communication and customer delight. Call spying (eavesdropping): your covert tool for quality assurance! Call barging (intrusion): real-time assistance, just a tap away! Call whispering: guidance right at your fingertips!

features.name: Direct calling from browser
features.content: Skip the 2-way calling and directly call from browser.Save your agent's calling time and enhance the customer experience, Easily connect two phone numbers without placing one on hold, initiating efficient customer conversations.

features.name: IVR Flow
features.content: Experience a cutting-edge IVR designed for swift, hassle-free customer interactionsOur smart IVR system goes beyond query resolution. It allows you to customize settings based on time or agent availability and offers voice message recording..

features.name: Bulk Voice
features.content: DEngage directly with your audience through a single callRecord your voice message and broadcast important information to hundreds and thousands of customers at once. A ringing phone call is hard to ignore, making it a powerful communication tool.

features.name: Multiple Way to Upload File
features.content: Upload your personalized audio message in multiple waysAmplify customer engagement with voice messages. Record your message for bulk voice calls or IVR menus using text-to-speech, your browser's microphone, or a phone call.

features.name: Bulk voice with IVR
features.content: Seamlessly connect voice calls to an IVRExtend your reach by not only sending bulk voice messages but also gathering user responses through an IVR.

features.name: Real time connect with agent on user input on bulk call
features.content: Efficiently direct users to your support agentsElevate the customer experience by offering real-time support and connecting users to customer support agents based on their bulk call input. Your Philippines-based support team is ready to assist you.

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
